title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 135.4 - Separation from service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 135.4 - Separation from service

State Regulations

Employees who retire from state service
and had an unused grant of bank credits prior to retirement may retain any
unused grant of bank credits, up to a maximum of 70 hours, for retirement
service credit or to pay for health insurance in retirement pursuant to section
24.4
(b) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
135.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
